Ail, Oignon, Njansan, Poivre blanc de Pe: garlic, onion, njanssang, Penja white pepper, celery,
Reconnue dans ce petit village du Camero: Recognized in this small village of Cameroon as one of the best cooks, KEUNI knew how to combine local spices, conferring that special taste to her dishes. The secret of our great grandmother’s tasty spice combinations was transmitted from mothers to daughters. Her recipes were the source of my inspiration when creating “SECRET” spices. «SECRET» spices is above all, the opportunity to honor this great lady who transmitted to my mother, my aunts, my cousins and myself this pas- sion for cooking and more specifically, for spices.
Nos sauces réussissent à allier le piqua: Our sauces thus succeeded in combining the spiciness of the Penja white pepper and the gentleness of njanssang (one of the star spices of the continent) in order to create an explosion of flavors, bringing out the delicately woody and musky aromas of this fine pepper
« SECRET » se décline en 3 recettes : Sa: SECRET exits in 3 recipes: chicken sauce, meat sauce and fish sauce. 3 sauces that will help you travel through the mother continent while you will be pre- paring your dishes.
Utilisé pour l’assaisonnement des volail: it serves for the seasoning of poultry and white meat. The chicken sauce perfectly brings out the taste of your dishes while conferring them a flavor and aroma that will make you salivate out of happiness
En dehors du poivre blanc de Penja, «Sec: A part from Penja white pepper, «SECRET» honors other  African spices like pèbè, njanssang, country onion, and Penja black pepper.
«SECRET» est une composition d’épices av: «SECRET» spices is a combination of local spices,basically onion and garlic presented insemi-flowing texture, utilized for seasoning ofdishes. Designed with the objective of reducingcooking time, but also making cooking time acces-sible and enjoyable. «SECRET» spices alreadycontains all ingredients you need to season yourmeat, chicken and fish. Because white meat, redmeat and fish are not seasoned the same way, «SECRET» is declined in 03 recipes.

misent sur l'éducation et ambitionnent d: focus on education and aim to build new eating habits.
Lancé en 2013 sur le marché Camerounais: Launched in 2013 on the Cameroonian market by the firm KEUNI FOODS, SECRET spices, advocate the return to a healthier diet. Because health begins with a good diet and because the spices of the African soil have many virtues, SECRET spices have been able to bring together in one packaging, the essentials of the seasoning necessary to give a taste of Africa to all your chicken and fish meat preparations
Il s'agit d'une marinade semi-liquide 10: It is a 100% natural semi-liquid marinade, ready to use and without flavor enhancers.
Introduit au Cameroun par Antoine Decré,: Introduced in Cameroon by Antoine Decré, the white pepper of Penja became in 2013 the first Protected Geographical Indication (PGI) of the African continent. It has become the pepper most prized by the great chefs of the world.
Nos sauces réussissent à allier le piqua: Our sauces manage to combine the spiciness of white Penja pepper and the sweetness of Djanssang
« SECRET » se décline en 3 recettes : Sa: « SECRET » comes in 3 recipes: Chicken Sauce, Meat Sauce and Fish Sauce
Sélection d’épices savamment dosé, écras: Selection of spices skilfully dosed, crushed, packaged ready to use to facilitate cooking for households and catering professionals
